name: DIVYA DEEPA CHARITABLE TRUST

address: Manandavadi Road, Rayanakere Post, Jayapura Hobli

briefDescription: Divya Deepa Charitable Trust is located on the outskirts of Mysore in a land of about 3 acres. We are running a free children home for opportunity deprived children and a free alternative school through which grassroots level research is going on.
